column1: sunteti English presidential candidate biden spent wednesday trying to mend splits between moderate and progressive democrats that threaten to topple his 3.5 trillion spending bill and a 1 trillion bipartisan infrastructure package within days . ruben navarrette: if the monster spending plan fails it could take down much of biden is legacy in one crushing collapse . he says a grim end to summer is turning into a defining political period for dr. john avlon brown: biden's efforts at classic oval office cajoling took place under extreme political pressure at a moment that will prove whether the president is a big success .
